item.title: Dagstuhl seminar recap
item.description:
I just returned from an intense and productive week at Dagstuhl Dagstuhl seminar. Together with Ben Carterette, Nicola Ferro, and Norbert Fuhr, I co-organized the seminar on the Frontiers of Information Access Experimentation for Research and Education.

It has been a great week. And I am very happy about the work we have accomplished and the inspiring discussions. I have learned a lot. The final report is indeed more or less done and only needs a bit of polishing before we can publish it. Thank you to all participants for your great contributions!

I am, of course, also very happy that we have invited the right people to also have fun in the music room ;-)

item.title: Dagstuhl seminar next week
item.description:
I am looking forward to spend next week at Schloss Dagstuhl. Together with Ben Carterette, Nicola Ferro, and Norbert Fuhr, I am co-organizer of the seminar on the Frontiers of Information Access Experimentation for Research and Education.

It will be an intense but—for sure—also an enjoyable and productive week.
